    • Uses of AuditQuery in org.hibernate.envers.query

      Methods in org.hibernate.envers.query that return AuditQuery 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AuditQuery AuditQuery.add(AuditCriterion criterion) 
      AuditQuery AuditQuery.addOrder(AuditOrder order) 
      AuditQuery AuditQuery.addProjection(AuditProjection projection) 
      AuditQuery AuditQueryCreator.forEntitiesAtRevision(Class<?> c, Number revision)
      Creates a query, which will return entities satisfying some conditions (specified later), at a given revision.
      AuditQuery AuditQueryCreator.forEntitiesAtRevision(Class<?> c, String entityName, Number revision)
      Creates a query, which will return entities satisfying some conditions (specified later), at a given revision and a given entityName.
      AuditQuery AuditQueryCreator.forEntitiesAtRevision(Class<?> c, String entityName, Number revision, boolean includeDeletions)
      Creates a query, which will return entities satisfying some conditions (specified later), at a given revision and a given entityName.
      AuditQuery AuditQueryCreator.forEntitiesModifiedAtRevision(Class<?> c, Number revision)
      Creates a query, which will return entities modified at the specified revision.
      AuditQuery AuditQueryCreator.forEntitiesModifiedAtRevision(Class<?> c, String entityName, Number revision)
      Creates a query, which will return entities modified at the specified revision.
      AuditQuery AuditQueryCreator.forRevisionsOfEntity(Class<?> c, boolean selectEntitiesOnly, boolean selectDeletedEntities)
      Creates a query, which selects the revisions, at which the given entity was modified.
      AuditQuery AuditQueryCreator.forRevisionsOfEntity(Class<?> c, String entityName, boolean selectEntitiesOnly, boolean selectDeletedEntities)
      Creates a query, which selects the revisions, at which the given entity was modified and with a given entityName.

    • Uses of AuditQuery in org.hibernate.envers.query.impl

      Classes in org.hibernate.envers.query.impl that implement AuditQuery 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractAuditQuery 
      class  EntitiesAtRevisionQuery 
      class  EntitiesModifiedAtRevisionQuery
      In comparison to EntitiesAtRevisionQuery this query returns an empty collection if an entity of a certain type has not been changed in a given revision.
      class  RevisionsOfEntityQuery
